2025

Subject
Fiscal Year (FY) 2026 State Workforce Agency Unemployment Insurance (UI) Resource Planning Targets and Guidelines


Purpose
To provide states with information about preliminary FY 2026 UI State Administration base resource planning targets, with general guidelines for resource planning, and an explanation of how the U.S. Department of Labor (Department) allocates base resources among the states.

Active
August 21, 2025


Contact
Please direct questions to the appropriate ETA regional office.


Originating Office
S

title: UIPL 15-24, Change 1
summary:
UIPL 15-24, Change 1
Panda.Srinivas‚Ä¶
Tue, 08/19/2025 - 08:52

2025
2025

Subject
Permanent Transition of Unemployment Insurance Required Reports (UIR) and Benefit Accuracy Measurement (BAM) Applications from the Unemployment Insurance Database Management System (UIDBMS) to the Unemployment Insurance Reporting System (UIRS)


Purpose
To provide State Workforce Agencies (SWAs) with advance notice of the upcoming permanent transition of the UIR and BAM applications from UIDBMS to UIRS; to provide instructions to SWAs on how to submit data to UIRS; and to advise SWAs that effective December 6, 2025, all states must transmit their UIR data only through UIRS and BAM data only through UIRS starting December 27, 2025.

Active
August 19, 2025


Contact
Please direct inquiries to the appropriate ETA Regional Office.


Originating Office
Select one


Program Office
OUI : Office of Unemployment Insurance


Record Type
Permanent


To
STATE WORKFORCE AGENCIES


From
LORI FRAZIER BEARDENActing Assist

title: Workday Acquires Paradox, A Bigger Deal Than You Think
summary:
This week I discuss Workday‚Äôs acquisition of Paradox, the pioneer in AI-powered conversational recruiting.
As I describe in detail, this is a big deal ‚Äì and it goes beyond Workday‚Äôs ability to now offer high-volume, conversational recruitment. Talent Acquisition itself is about to radically change with AI, and this moves Workday into a leading position in what we call ‚ÄúThe Revolution in Talent Acquisition.‚Äù (Report coming out in October.)
I also discuss the latest trends in AI transformation in general, and what we‚Äôve now learned about HR job redesign and how AI really is changing the fundamentals of HR operating models (automating Systemic HR) and job design.
For access to all our research, analysis, professional development, and tools, get Galileo, the world‚Äôs AI assistant for HR.
Additional Information
Will Chatbots Take Over HR Tech? Paradox Sets The Pace.
The Systemic HR Operating Model: How AI Transforms The Function
Learn about AI in HR: Join The Josh Bersin Academy (Galileo Lea

title: Pre-calibrations: The cornerstone for smooth reviews | Remote Perform
summary:
Performance reviews don‚Äôt start in the meeting, they start with pre-calibration.

 Barbara Matthews, Chief People Officer at Remote, shares how HR leaders can use pre-calibrations to align managers and employees, set expectations, and streamline the performance review cycle.

 Learn why pre-calibration is a best practice for global HR teams focused on employee performance, people management, and continuous feedback.
